text: Soni ndema jakusoomedwa kukwao ma Ȃya Getu gakupikanika, tinkuone kungope kwa aŵala ŵakanile kunyalaisidwa (kwakanila), akusigalaga panandi kwatenda uwanga aŵala ŵaakwaasoomela ma Ȃya Getu. Jilani: “Ana nantagulile yakusakala nnope kumpunda yalakweyo? Moto (wa Jahannama) waataŵene nao Allah chilanga aŵala ŵaakanile. Kaje kusakala nnope malo gakuujila gakwe!”
